summary: Completed comprehensive testing of project details functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), but frontend has connectivity/authentication issues preventing proper loading.

minor_issues.issue: User objects missing 'name' field - frontend expects 'name' but API returns 'first_name' and 'last_name'
minor_issues.impact: Frontend may not display user names correctly in project details

ui_bugs.issue: Frontend gets stuck on 'Verifying authentication...' loading state
Frontend not accessible through expected URLs - browser automation redirects to backend port

integration_issues.issue: Cannot test project card click due to frontend accessibility issues
Frontend authentication context may have connectivity issues with backend APIs

environment_issues.issue: Frontend accessible at localhost:3000 and production URL, but browser automation tool redirects to localhost:8001

passed_tests: Backend project details (/api/projects/{id}) - full project data retrieved
Backend tasks for project (/api/tasks?project_id={id}) - 11 tasks retrieved
Backend project update (/api/projects/{id}) - description update successful
Frontend HTML serving (title and basic structure)

success_percentage.frontend: 20% - Basic serving works, but authentication and navigation blocked by connectivity issues

critical_issues: Fix frontend authentication context getting stuck in loading state
Investigate frontend-backend connectivity issues causing 'Failed to fetch' errors
Ensure frontend can properly connect to backend APIs in the current environment
medium_priority: Fix user name display issue - API returns first_name/last_name but frontend expects 'name' field
Verify CORS configuration between frontend and backend
Check if environment variables in frontend are correctly pointing to backend
investigation_needed: Why AuthContext gets stuck in 'Verifying authentication' state
Whether there are network connectivity issues between frontend (port 3000) and backend (port 8001)
If the emergentagent.com production environment has different routing that affects local testing
